item.title: SIM Library Assistant
item.description: A chrome extension to reload the e-resources with proxied access. Links Github | Chrome Webstore Summary This chrome extension automatically reloads the eligible resource sites with the proxied access. It currently supports: SIM Library at http://libproxy.sim.edu.sg University of London Online Library (Coming up) RMIT Library (Coming up) Note - The extension is for intended use by SIM students and requires SIM library account for access.
